participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and resilient, she expresses her emotions through art and storytelling.
participant_1.background: I've been rejected several times and thought of giving up with this. And also love drawing. I've started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers. I decided to publish my creations on the internet. I love comics.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and nurturing, he finds joy in the simple pleasures of life and has a strong connection with nature.
participant_2.background: I have a farm with pigs, horses, and hens. I love country music. I love animals. I love dancing. I am a vegan.

content.text: It's nice to meet you! What do you like to do for fun?
I love animals, and I have a farm with pigs, horses, and hens. I also love country music and dancing.
That sounds great! I love animals too. I've always wanted to own a farm.
It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding. I love being able to care for my animals and watch them grow.
That's so nice. I'm vegan, so I don't eat meat.
Oh, me too! I love animals too much to eat them.
That's great! We have something in common.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to draw and paint. I also love to read and write.
That's great! I love to draw and paint too.
We have a lot in common!
It's nice to meet you too.
